casebody.data:
MOORE, Jr.
v.
BOARD OF ELECTIONS OF HENDERSON COUNTY 287P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 28, 2017 John David Noor, Attorney at Law, Asheville, for Moore, John Fitzgerald (Jr.). Charles Russell Burrell, Attorney at Law, for Board of Elections of Henderson County.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of August 2017 by Petitioner for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of August 2017."
